column4: i have a problem with my alsa .. i cant hear 2 things at the same time.. just skype or just movie or just juk or just youtube.. i coudnt find any answers in google.. only people with the same problem..
i currently have the same problem. i can play music while simultaneusly playing audio on firefox but some programs like skype do not work with others
i think it's because those programs use hardware directly i'm not really sure
